post.summary: Creates a new channel in Slack.
post.description: The createChannel function creates a new channel in Slack, which can be either public or private. It takes an object with the channel name and an optional privacy setting, and returns a detailed channel object containing various properties of the newly created channel.

body.description: Body of the createChannel sls call

name.description: The name of the channel to create.

isPrivate.description: Whether the channel should be private. Defaults to false.

join.description: Whether the user should join the channel. Defaults to true.

is_channel.description: Indicates if the object represents a channel.

is_group.description: Indicates if the object represents a private channel.

is_im.description: Indicates if the object represents a direct message conversation.

created.description: A Unix timestamp indicating when the channel was created.

creator.description: The ID of the user who created the channel.

is_archived.description: Indicates if the channel is archived.

is_general.description: Indicates if the channel is the default "general" channel.

unlinked.description: The number of members that have been removed from the channel

name_normalized.description: The channel name, but with any special characters replaced.

is_shared.description: Indicates if the channel is shared with other workspaces.

is_ext_shared.description: Indicates if the channel is part of an external shared connection.

is_org_shared.description: Indicates if the channel is shared with the entire organization.

pending_shared.description: A list of team IDs that have been invited to the channel but have not yet joined

is_pending_ext_shared.description: Indicates if the conversation is ready to become an external shared channel but needs approval

is_member.description: Indicates if the calling user is a member of the channel.

is_private.description: Indicates if the channel is private.

is_mpim.description: Indicates if the object represents a multi-person direct message.

topic.description: An object containing the channel's topic information.

purpose.description: An object containing the channel's purpose information.

previous_names.description: A list of any previous names the channel had.

num_members.description: The number of members in the channel.

error.description: Error message describing the issue with the request

403.description: Forbidden - Not authorized to create channels

error.description: Error message indicating lack of permissions
Error message indicating a server-side issue
